trans-unit.source: Bloom cannot find some of its own files, and cannot continue
trans-unit.target: Bloom man kuriq ta nik'aj taq chi kech ri k'olchak xuquje' man kuya taj kutaqej

alt-trans.target: Bloom ma kuraq ta nik'aj taq chi kech ri k'olchak xuquje' man kuya taj kutaqej

trans-unit.source: Your antivirus may have "quarantined" one or more Bloom files.
trans-unit.target: Le aq'atel uchikopil te'qne xkowin che "ukojik pa ukawinaq q'ij" chech jun te'qne k'i taq k'olchak rech Bloom.

alt-trans.target: Ri aq'atel chikop xkowin ne che "ukojik pa kawinaq q'ij" chech jun o k'i taq k'olchak rech Bloom.

trans-unit.source: Your computer administrator may have your computer "locked down" to prevent bad things, but in such a way that Bloom could not place these files where they belong.
trans-unit.target: Karaj ne ri k'ak'ale'nel rech ri kematz'ib' "q'atum rij" rech uq'atexik k'ex taq jastaq, xa k'ut xub'ano rech ri Bloom man xkowin taj chech ukojik we k'i taq suk' k'olchak.

alt-trans.target: Kajne ri k'ak'le'nik rech ri akematz'ib' "q'atum rij" rech uq'atuxik k'ex taq sutaq, xa k'ut xub'ano rech ri Bloom ma xkowin taj che ukojik we k'i taq suk' k'olchak.

trans-unit.source: After you submit this report, we will contact you and help you work this out. In the meantime, here are some ideas:
trans-unit.target: Are taq xtaqtaj ub'ik le woktzijob'al, katqach'ab'ej rech katqato'o. Rech kopan ri', waral k'o nik'aj taq no'jib'al:

alt-trans.target: K'a te k'u ri che utaqik we woktzijob'al, katqataq b'i ruk' ri ajch'ab'em rech katuto'. Rech kopan ri', waral k'o nik'aj taq no'j:

trans-unit.source: Run the Bloom installer again, and see if it starts up OK this time.
trans-unit.target: Chatzalij uchakuxik ri jaqb'anel rech Bloom rech kiltajik we utz umajik kub'ano.

alt-trans.target: Chatzelej uchakuxik ri jaqb'anel rech Bloom che rilik we mul ri' kumaj suk'ulik.

trans-unit.source: If that doesn't fix it, it's time to talk to your anti-virus program. If the "Missing Files" section below shows any files which end in ".exe", consider "whitelisting" the Bloom program folder, which is at {{installFolder}}.
trans-unit.target: We man kusol taj, xopan ri q'ij katzukuj ri kematal chak rech uq'atel uchikopil. We ri wokutas rech "K'olchak Karaj na" ("Missing Files") kuk'ut k'olchak ri kak'is pa ".exe", chawila ukojik ri kematal chak Bloom pa ri "saq cholib'al" ("white list"), k'o chi upam ubicada en {{installFolder}}.

alt-trans.target: We jeri' ma kusol taj, xopan ri q'ij katzukuj akem chak rech kuna'o xuquje' kuchup ri chikop. We ri utas rech "K'olchak Karaj na" ("Missing Files") k'utb'al k'olchak kak'is pa ".exe", chawila ukojik ri k'olyakb'al chak rech ri nuk'wach Bloom pa ri "chol saq" ("white list"), k'o chi upam ubicada en {{installFolder}}.

trans-unit.target: Uq'atel chikopil Norton: Choltaqanik rech Symantec.

trans-unit.note: The former source text had an incorrect & following l=en_US in the href attribute value.

trans-unit.target: Jun chik: Utzukuxik "whitelist directory name-of-your-antivirus" ("directorio de lista blanca nombre-de-su-antivirus") en Google

trans-unit.source: Run the Bloom installer again, and see if it starts up OK this time.
trans-unit.target: Chatzalij uchakuxik ri jaqb'anel rech Bloom rech kiltajik we utz umajik kub'ano.

trans-unit.source: You can also try and retrieve the part of Bloom that your anti-virus program took from it. For AVG, you need to find the AVG "options" menu, click "virus vault", click on the Bloom file in the vault, and click "restore". For a visual guide, see this image.
trans-unit.target: Xuquje' kakowinik uriqik chik jumul ri tz'aqatil Bloom chi xk'exik uk'olib'al rumal ri kematal chak rech ri uq'atel chikopil. Chech AVG, rajawaxik uriqik ri cholb'al rech "ya'tal ucha'ik". Chab'ana pitz' pa "Uk'olib'al chikopil", chab'ana pitz' pa ri k'olchak rech Bloom pa ri laj taq k'olib'al xuquje' chab'ana pitz' pa "k'ak' ujeqeb'axik". Rech jun k'amal b'e ilib'al, rilik we wachib'al ri'.

alt-trans.target: Xuquje' kakowinik uraqik chik jumul ri tz'aqatil Bloom che xk'exik rumal ri nuk'uwach chak rech ri q'atelchikop. Rech AVG, rajawaxik uraqik ri cholb'al rech "Opciones". Chab'ana pitz' pa "BÃ³veda de Virus", chab'ana pitz' pa ri k'olchak rech Bloom pa ri laj taq k'olib'al xuquje' chb'ana pitz' pa "Restaurar". Rech jun k'amal b'e ilib'al, rilik esta imagen.
